attributes.action: Remove British Telecom's stranglehold on the UK's communications infrastructure
attributes.background: As a business owner and parent i am forced to use BT and their infrastructure for Broadband and phone where i live and work. Prices are expensive, service delivery unreliable and customer service awful. Both BT and BT Openreach should be broken up to introduce competition and improve service levels.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as this isn't something that the Government or Parliament could do. This would be a decision for the Competition and Markets Authority which is independent of both the UK Government and Parliament. You can find out more about the Competition and Markets Authority here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/competition-and-markets-authority/about
